cheat.description: Never overheat
Never crash
Recover fast after crashes
Reduced enemy bikes in game B
Timer runs at half speed
Timer runs at quarter speed
Turbo speed on button A (1 of 2)
Turbo speed on button A (2 of 2)
Mega turbo speed on button A (1 of 2)
Mega turbo speed on button A (2 of 2)
Never crash when holding forward (1 of 3)
Never crash when holding forward (2 of 3)
Never crash when holding forward (3 of 3)
Never lose speed (even if you crash)
Infinite obstacles in design mode
Start racing before gate opens (1 of 4)
Start racing before gate opens (2 of 4)
Start racing before gate opens (3 of 4)
Start racing before gate opens (4 of 4)
Press Start to complete current race (uses your race position for the verdict) (1 of 2)
Press Start to complete current race (uses your race position for the verdict) (2 of 2)
